content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Romanian version of the training is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":33520,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2674a0ae-d368-4129-b152-b86f9e1040e2/Romania - Romanian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/2674a0ae-d368-4129-b152-b86f9e1040e2/Romania - Romanian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Romania - Romanian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"name\":\"Romania - Romanian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"2674a0ae-d368-4129-b152-b86f9e1040e2\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English version:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems International SRL whose principal office is at 48 Iancu Hunedoara Boulevard, Floor 9, Sector 1, 011745 Bucharest, Romania, registered with the Romanian Trade Register under no. J40/5735/2014, Sole Registration Code 33159615 (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") recognizes our employees' right to privacy.  We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individually identifiable information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal information\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"), pursuant to the General Data Protection Regulation (EU) No. 2016/679 (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“GDPR”\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") and the applicable Romanian legislation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a \\\"data controller\\\". This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you are processed and the means we use to carry such processing activities out. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pursuant to the GDPR, we are required to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice. It is important that you read this privacy notice so that you are aware of how and why we process your personal data.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
